# withAllAvailableDescriptors

**Type Property**

The font collection that matches all registered fonts.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying class var withAllAvailableDescriptors: NSFontCollection { get }
```

## Return Value

The collection of all fonts available to the current application.

## Creating Font Collections

- **init(descriptors:)**: Returns a font collection matching the given descriptors.
- **init(locale:)**: Returns a collection of fonts matching the given locale.
- **init(name:)**: Creates a named font collection object.
- **init(name:visibility:)**: Creates a font collection with the specified name and font visibility.
